data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Muchinga.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Muchinga, Zambia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Muchinga, Zambia.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Muchinga to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Muchinga that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Jew, English-speaking people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Jew, English-speaking people.
Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Muchinga.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Muchinga, Zambia will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Muchinga, Zambia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Muchinga
location.people_groups_list: Sala, Swahili, Congo, Han Chinese, Mandarin, Simaa-Mwenyi, Kunda
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Sala (43,000), Swahili, Congo (44,000), Han Chinese, Mandarin (51,000), Simaa-Mwenyi (8,500), Kunda (58,000)
